text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2000 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Santiago, Chile, at Estadio Nacional Julio Martínez Prádanos on 20 and 22 October. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Cornelius Chirchir ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Wolfram Müller ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Philemon Tanui ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 22 October {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
